alert.note: Alert for Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains Between 8500 And 11000 Ft; Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains above 11000 Ft; Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Above 11000 Ft; Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Between 7500 and 11000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 24 at 3:57AM MST until November 25 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 5 to 10 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...The Sangre De Cristo Mountains. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
